Text:
Ryan Gosling is a fine actor who may or may not also be the sexiest man on the planet, but he has not left his music behind, and while these songs are hardly what he was performing on the Mickey Mouse Club when he and Justin Timberlake were roommates, even if he had no other career, this stuff is terrific and well worth a listen. And then another and another and....

Thank you for uploading this excellent album.
